name: Happy Earth 100% Natuurlijke Handzeep Cedar Lime
composition:
INGREDIENTS: Aqua, Coco-Glucoside, Sodium Coco-Sulfate, Glycerin, Sodium Chloride, Parfum*, Glyceryl Oleate, Cinnamomum Camphora Linalooliferum Wood Oil*, Citrus Grandis Peel Oil*, Juniperus Mexicana Wood Oil*, Citrus Aurantium Amara Fruit Extract*, Betaine, Tocopherol, Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides Citrate, Levulinic Acid, Sodium Levulinate, Sodium Anisate, Limonene*, Linalool*, Citronellol*, Lactic Acid, Citric Acid.
*From natural botanical extracts and essential oils
